Articles.Content:
This thing is actually a pretty cool concept. It's a spaceplane which is able to take off normally and land vertically like a Falcon 9 first stage.
I want to see this fly to the old runway, go up high, or even to orbit. I want to see someone to take this to higher heights. All I was able to do was go up a bit and land.

DOWNLOAD THIS
Nice!  Have you tried a Minmus vertical landing with it?
That's like a backwards fly back booster! Really cool! The truly Kerbal way (how I did it) is land an aeris 4A vertically on the VAB.
